dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Tegelaar, Karolina
Leimar, Olof
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Aphid embryo size distribution
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: The file contains data on the distribution of aphid embryos over size categories, for a number of dissected adult aphids that were sampled from the main experiment of the study, including unattended and ant-attended aphids. Each row of the data file corresponds to one dissected aphid.
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: aphid-ant mutualism
maternal effects
reproductive investment
embryo size
plasticity
